id.description: The unique identifier for the ClientAccount

accountNumber.description: The Client Account number that is displayed.

accountName.description:
The name given to the account by the client.
Defaults to the head of household's last name.

contactName.description:
Name of the primary contact for the Client Account.
Defaults to the "Head of Household" Client.

address.description: The address for correspondence related to the Client Account.

addressType.description: Future use.  If used, SHOULD be set to 'Mailing'.

addressAggregate.description: The aggregate address for use when the individual components are not known.

street1.description: First line of the postal address, e.g. 100 Main St.

street2.description: Second line of the postal address, e.g. Apt 100.

state.description: For domestic addresses, use USPS two-digit state code.

countyCode.description:
Properties countyCode and county are mutually exclusive.  Use countyCode when the source
system provides a two-character code.  If the source is the actual County name, then use
the county property.

county.description:
Properties countyCode and county are mutually exclusive.  Use countyCode when the source
system provides a two-character code.  If the source is the actual County name, then use
the county property.

townshipCode.description:
Properties townshipCode and township are mutually exclusive.  Use townshipCode when the source
system provides a two-character code.  If the source is the actual Township name, then use
the township property.

township.description:
Properties townshipCode and township are mutually exclusive.  Use townshipCode when the source
system provides a two-character code.  If the source is the actual Township name, then use
the township property.

phoneNumber.description: The primary phone number for the Client Account contact.
The phone number in the ITU-T E.164.1 Format,

phoneType.description: These enumerations are sourced from Exceed Client

agentId.description: The id of the agent associated with the account.

relatedClients.description: Array of objects containing relatedClients associated to ClientAccount
